And Peter, <S%G4074><s%> fastening <S%G816><s%> his eyes on him with John, <S%G2491><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Look <S%G991><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> us.
And he gave <S%G1907><s%> heed <S%G1907><s%> to them, expecting <S%G4328><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> of them.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Silver <S%G694><s%> and gold <S%G5553><s%> have <S%G5225><s%> I none; <S%G3756><s%> but such as I have <S%G2192><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> I you: In the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> rise <S%G1453><s%> up and walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And he took <S%G4084><s%> him by the right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and lifted <S%G1453><s%> him up: and immediately <S%G3916><s%> his feet <S%G939><s%> and ankle <S%G4974><s%> bones <S%G4974><s%> received <S%G4732><s%> strength. <S%G4732><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him walking <S%G4043><s%> and praising <S%G134><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

And they knew <S%G1921><s%> that it was he which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> for alms <S%G1654><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the Beautiful <S%G5611><s%> gate <S%G4439><s%> of the temple: <S%G2411><s%> and they were filled <S%G4130><s%> with wonder <S%G2285><s%> and amazement <S%G1611><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> that which had happened <S%G4819><s%> to him.

And as the lame <S%G5560><s%> man which was healed <S%G2390><s%> held <S%G2902><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> ran <S%G4936><s%> together <S%G4936><s%> to them in the porch <S%G4745><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Solomon's, <S%G4672><s%> greatly <S%G1569><s%> wondering. <S%G1569><s%>

And when Peter <S%G4074><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he answered <S%G611><s%> to the people, <S%G2992><s%> You men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> marvel <S%G2296><s%> you at <S%G1909><s%> this? <S%G5129><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> look <S%G816><s%> you so earnestly <S%G816><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us, as though by our own <S%G2398><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> holiness <S%G2150><s%> we had made <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G846><s%> man to walk? <S%G4043><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and of Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> has glorified <S%G1392><s%> his Son <S%G3816><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you delivered <S%G3860><s%> up, and denied <S%G720><s%> him in the presence <S%G4383><s%> of Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> when he was determined <S%G2919><s%> to let <S%G630><s%> him go. <S%G630><s%>
But you denied <S%G720><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> One and the Just, <S%G1342><s%> and desired <S%G154><s%> a murderer <S%G5406><s%> to be granted <S%G5483><s%> to you;

And killed <S%G615><s%> the Prince <S%G747><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> we are witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

And his name <S%G3686><s%> through <S%G1909><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in his name <S%G3686><s%> has made <S%G4732><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> man strong, <S%G4732><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you see <S%G2334><s%> and know: <S%G1492><s%> yes, <S%G2532><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which is by him has given <S%G1325><s%> him this <S%G5126><s%> perfect <S%G3647><s%> soundness <S%G3647><s%> in the presence <S%G561><s%> of you all. <S%G3956><s%>

And now, <S%G3568><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that through <S%G2596><s%> ignorance <S%G52><s%> you did <S%G4238><s%> it, as did also <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> rulers. <S%G758><s%>

But those things, which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G4293><s%> had showed <S%G4293><s%> by the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> his prophets, <S%G4396><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> should suffer, <S%G3958><s%> he has so <S%G3779><s%> fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

Repent <S%G3340><s%> you therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and be converted, <S%G1994><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> may be blotted <S%G1813><s%> out, when <S%G3704><s%> the times <S%G2540><s%> of refreshing <S%G403><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> from the presence <S%G4383><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
And he shall send <S%G649><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which before <S%G4296><s%> was preached <S%G4296><s%> to you:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the times <S%G5550><s%> of restitution <S%G605><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things, which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has spoken <S%G2980><s%> by the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> his holy <S%G40><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> began.

For Moses <S%G3475><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the fathers, <S%G3962><s%> A prophet <S%G4396><s%> shall the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raise <S%G450><s%> up to you of your <S%G5216><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> like <S%G3945><s%> to me; him shall you hear <S%G191><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> he shall say <S%G2980><s%> to you.

You are the children <S%G5207><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and of the covenant <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G1303><s%> with our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> And in your seed <S%G4690><s%> shall all <S%G3956><s%> the kindreds <S%G3965><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> be blessed. <S%G1757><s%>
